name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Malcolm H. TORAN, Appellee

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Malcolm H. TORAN, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
NIGRO, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Christopher M. McElynn, Erie, for Com.
David Ridge, Joseph Burt, Erie, for Malcolm Toran.
casebody.head_matter:
675 A.2d 710
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Malcolm H. TORAN, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 19, 1996.
Decided May 21, 1996.
Christopher M. McElynn, Erie, for Com.
Malcolm Toran, pro se.
David Ridge, Joseph Burt, Erie, for Malcolm Toran.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
